## Thank you for contributing to Awesome Learn!

Please ensure your pull request follows the guidelines for learning-path contributions.

### Checklist

- [ ] My submission follows the official Learning Path Template.
- [ ] The content is structured, clear, and written in a learner-friendly style.
- [ ] I have kept recommendations minimal (no long link dumps).
- [ ] All included resources are high-quality, relevant, and publicly accessible.
- [ ] No affiliate links, referral codes, or commercial promotions are included.
- [ ] This PR does not duplicate an existing learning path or section.
- [ ] I have reviewed `CONTRIBUTING.md` before submitting.
- [ ] If this is my own project or resource, it meets the notability and quality guidelines.

### Description of the Change

<!-- Describe the learning path or improvements you are submitting, why they are valuable, and how they fit the Awesome Learn philosophy -->

### Additional Notes (Optional)

<!-- Any clarifications, context, or questions for maintainers -->
